website_summaries.verdict: Hailing from the original Asics Gel Kenun, the Gel Kenun Lyte is a neutral road running shoe that many appreciated for its comfort, versatility, and functionality. Plenty of users were able to use it as an everyday sneaker and a workout shoe. There were those that said it was a bit challenging to slip into it, but it still proved to be reliable especially for those looking for an all-in-one shoe that fits the budget.
pros: A few users appreciated that the Gel Kenun Lyte is of good value
Plenty of reviewers were glad that the overall design was current and stylish
Many agreed that the shoe felt comfortable
A majority of testers commented on the versatility and functionality delivered
Most used it for everyday wear, going to the gym, running errands, and even training
Some users said that the fit was true to size
One tester mentioned the upper being breathable enough for spring and summer
Most recognized the lightness of the shoe
A few reviewers said that the midsole had enough cushioning
cons: A few consumers observed that the shoe was a bit hard to put on
A female tester did not like the fit because it is too long for her taste
Some reviewers mentioned that the width was a bit tight
Some runners observed the sole unit wearing away quickly after only a few months of use
A few individuals felt that the frame of this product made the foot look awkwardly wide

customer_reviews.title: Putting these shoes on is like stuffing your foot into a bicycle innertube.
customer_reviews.text: These are the most uncomfortable shoes I've ever put on. ASICS is a brand that has made extremely comfortable shoes throughout its history; it's hard to believe these are made by ASICS. Didn't anyone try them on before putting them on the market? Putting these shoes on is like stuffing your foot into a bicycle innertube, it bunches your socks up so that when you do accomplish getting your foot inside, your bunched up socks hurt your toes. The size is correct, but the elastic sleeve makes these shoes unbearable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: I love the "belt buckle" idea for the tongue
customer_reviews.text: I love the "belt buckle" idea for the tongue. The only issue is that the shoes are slightly tight, at first. They almost feel like slip-ons and no need to tie them. I walked around for a while and they stretched. I took several walks and short runs and these are quite comfortable. Very soft on my runs and very little shock, great soles. Great for my knees. I'd purchase another pair. Love the color too!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Frasier

customer_reviews.title: These are a little tight
customer_reviews.text: The other reviews are correct. These are a little tight when you put them on. When I'm actually walking or running in them though, they feel fine. They look great as well. We'll see if they stretch out a bit over time. if they weren't so tight this would be a 5* review all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: I am size 11. I ordered size 11 this time but the shoes felt too tight on the sides (too narrow), especially the right shoe. I had to return it for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Fits fairly excellent, although snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Received as indicated and as promised. Fits fairly excellent, although snug fit, due to the high instep, took some time to get the hang of wearing and putting on. But, once on, it is an excellent comfort and support.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L. Gaberdiel

customer_reviews.title: Nice but too small
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the shoes, nice and sleek and felt comfortable but just too small. They constricted my feet and I could feel my blood circulation struggling. So I had to return them. Definitely order a size up if you decide to go with these
customer_reviews.author: CJ James

customer_reviews.title: so soft
customer_reviews.text: very nice, soft and light, but I would rather order a bigger size, these runs small, so take in count to choose a half of a size prior to order it.
customer_reviews.author: Jhonatan

customer_reviews.title: Too tight and gave away
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is super light and what I wanted but they were too tight and gave them away because they didn't come true to size.
customer_reviews.author: yosarian

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Shows look great very light and help a lot with my flat feet. Everything i expected and great shipping. The product surpasses what i expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: On time. Great pricing. Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't actually run it yet. Walked around a bit. It's very comfortable. Quite snug. Laces may not be necessary. Lol. But it's slightly tight where my big toes join to my feet but I'll either get used to it or the shoe will confirm to my foot after some uses.
customer_reviews.author: Kieve C. Guevara

customer_reviews.title: Pretty mediocre
customer_reviews.text: The booty is bad, shoe is kind of ugly, gel feels weird, just not a very mature product overall from asics. The only thing I liked about these is the knit fabric on the forefoot area. Disappointed because they looked pretty nice in the pictures
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits fairly excellent, although snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Received as indicated and as promised. Fits fairly excellent, although snug fit, due to the high instep, took some time to get the hang of wearing and putting on. But, once on, it is an excellent comfort and support.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L. Gaberdiel

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love them!!! I just hate how they get thirty fast, but it's to be expected with light color shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Could be nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice idea, did not like the sock like fit. I have a narrow foot and these are fine on the foot but overall tight especially over instep. Now discontinues.
customer_reviews.author: JRS

customer_reviews.title: Foam bottom - not a "Gel" not very supportive - 3 months of use
customer_reviews.text: Especially when new, they are very tight. I don't like the sole or base, not on par with all the true Gel shoes from Asics that I've had previously. I would go back to the Kayano's next time, so I wouldn't advise getting these.
customer_reviews.author: vr6tjet2

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These have held up so we'll. My son still wears them and says they're very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Big mistakes !!!
customer_reviews.text: The product I received was completely different in model and size !!!!
customer_reviews.author: MARY

customer_reviews.title: Fit is weird.
customer_reviews.text: Just not as comfortable as I had hoped. I wear running and cross training shoes daily. Thought I’d take a chance on these. At least I have some cool looking yard shoes now.
customer_reviews.author: Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, go up half a size. It'll save you time and room.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and feeling shoe. Very lite and durable. I would recommend going up half a size because they are a bit smaller than your average shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Antoine

customer_reviews.title: nice style, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Too small, returned it for a larger size, awaiting refund, nice style, comfortable, quality shoe for the price. Its strange because i have asics in another style and 8.5 fit me perfectly but these were too small
customer_reviews.author: Justin chiang

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoe, but narrow fit!
customer_reviews.text: It is great looking shoe, it was to tight for my feet, if I could have gotten wider fitting shoe in this shoe I would have given a five star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Wims

customer_reviews.title: Gel Sole=Amazing Comfortability
customer_reviews.text: I wear these to work every single day and i bought another pair to use for working out, they are the most comfortable breathable shoe i've ever had, very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Elling

customer_reviews.title: excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing for a couple months now everyday. great quality
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Mantel

customer_reviews.title: A Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: A nice look and great to walk and run with
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Value!
customer_reviews.text: You can't ever go wrong with ASICS shoes - and at this price jump on it!
customer_reviews.author: Conor

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are probably the most comfortable pair of shoes I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable as described.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is not as comfortable as described! Fit is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap make.
customer_reviews.text: Toes frayed easily. Cheap stuff, looks like the toes hit a cheese grater after 1 use.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Ashanti

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. Didnt use it for running yet, but it feels comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son. Looked and Fit just as come to expect from ASICS shoes, lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Pat wallace

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe for the money. We will see how they hold up!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ishman

customer_reviews.title: Great casual shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Probably not a true 'running shoe', but great with jeans and for walking.
customer_reviews.author: JVLB

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, fitted a little too big, but for the most part a great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Escamilla

product_meta.title: Asics Mens Gel-Kenun Lyte Shoes
product_meta.description: Asics is a Japanese footwear and apparel company. They are ranked one of the top brands for sports enthusiasts. With their innovative technology they promise to continue to create the best products and they believe that by promoting health and fitness people can create a happy and healthy lifestyle. These Mens Asics Gel-Kenun Lyte Running Shoes are guaranteed authentic. They're crafted with Synthetic Fiber/Synthetic Leather/Rubber, and the closure is Front Lace.
feature_bullets: Rearfoot GEL technology cushioning System Attenuates shock during impact phase and allows for a smooth transition to midstance.
I.G.S (Impact Guidance System) Technology ASICS design philosophy that employs linked componentry to enhance the foot's natural gait from heel strike to toe-off.
Solyte Midsole Material A lighter weight midsole compound than ASICS standard EVA and SpEVA midsoles. Also features enhanced cushioning and durability.
Ortholite Sockliner Moisture management (Ortholite is a registered trademark of ATP Manufacturing LLC).
Seamless Construction The use of seamless materials reduces the potential for irritation and friction caused by traditional stitches and seams.
